mapper.sql: id, user_id, lib_paper_id, lib_result, lib_ok, lib_score, lib_intgl, finish_time
mapper.select:
select
from da_exam_lib_user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND lib_paper_id = #{libPaperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 1

SELECT eu.user_id,SUM(lu.lib_score) score,SUM(lu.lib_intgl) intgl FROM da_exam_user eu LEFT JOIN da_exam_lib_paper lp on eu.paper_id=lp.paper_id LEFT JOIN da_exam_lib_user lu on lp.lib_id=lu.lib_paper_id AND eu.user_id=lu.user_id WHERE eu.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND eu.paper_id=#{libPaperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY eu.user_id LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: insert into da_exam_lib_user (id, user_id, lib_paper_id, lib_result, lib_ok, lib_score, lib_intgl, finish_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{libPaperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{libResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{libOk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{libScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{libIntgl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
